column.name: npsp__Home_Zip_Postal_Code__c
column.remarks: Label: Home Zip/Postal Code Help: Address.npsp__MailingPostalCode__c

column.name: npsp__ImportedDate__c
column.remarks: Label: Imported Date Help: When the Data Import record was successfully imported.

column.name: npsp__NPSP_Data_Import_Batch__c
column.remarks: Label: NPSP Data Import Batch Help: an optional NPSP Data Import Batch this record belongs to Referenced: npsp__NPSP_Data_Imports__r

column.name: npsp__Payment_Check_Reference_Number__c
column.remarks: Label: Payment Check/Reference Number Help: Payment.npe01__Check_Reference_Number__c

column.name: npsp__Payment_Possible_Matches__c
column.remarks: Label: Payment Possible Matches Help: A comma separated list of ID's to the first 10 possible Payment matches to a donation.

column.name: npsp__Status__c
column.remarks: Label: Status Help: The status of importing the Data Import record. Picklist: Imported | Failed

table.name: npsp__DataImportBatch__c
table.remarks: Labels: NPSP Data Import Batch | NPSP Data Import Batches

column.name: npsp__Account_Custom_Unique_ID__c
column.remarks: Label: Account Custom Unique ID Help: An optional Unique Id field to use for Organization Account matching

column.name: npsp__Batch_Process_Size__c
column.remarks: Label: Batch Process Size Help: The number of NPSP Data Import records to process at a time in each batch.

column.name: npsp__Contact_Custom_Unique_ID__c
column.remarks: Label: Contact Custom Unique ID Help: An optional Unique Id field to use for Contact matching

column.name: npsp__Contact_Matching_Rule__c
column.remarks: Label: Contact Matching Rule Help: Specifies which rule to follow when trying to match Contacts in Data Import records against existing Contacts.

column.name: npsp__Donation_Date_Range__c
column.remarks: Label: Number of Days from Donation Date Default: 0 Help: Enter the number of days from the Donation Date to consider when looking for a matching Opportunity or Payment. The Data Importer will choose the matching Opp or Payment whose date falls within the number of days AND is closest to the Donation Date.

column.name: npsp__Donation_Matching_Behavior__c
column.remarks: Label: Donation Matching Behavior Help: Defines how the Data Importer should handle matching Donations. You must choose a value. Picklist: Do Not Match | No Match | Single Match | Single Match or Create | Best Match | Best Match or Create

column.name: npsp__Donation_Matching_Implementing_Class__c
column.remarks: Label: Donation Matching Implementing Class Help: The developer name of an Apex class that implements the BDI_IMatching interface for Donations. Leave blank to let NPSP handle matching.

column.name: npsp__Donation_Matching_Rule__c
column.remarks: Label: Donation Matching Rule Help: Specifies which fields to match by when trying to match Donations in Data Import records against existing Opportunities and Payments. Control or Command click to select more than one field.

column.name: npsp__Engagement_Plan_Template__c
column.remarks: Label: Engagement Plan Template Referenced: npsp__Engagement_Plans__r (cascade delete)

column.name: npsp__Status__c
column.remarks: Label: Status Formula: IF( npsp__Completed_Tasks__c == npsp__Total_EP_Tasks__c, $Label.npsp__statuscompleted, IF (npsp__Completed_Tasks__c > 0, $Label.npsp__statusinprogress, $Label.npsp__statusnotstarted))

table.name: npsp__Engagement_Plan_Task__c
table.remarks: Labels: Engagement Plan Task | Engagement Plan Tasks

column.name: npsp__Engagement_Plan_Template__c
column.remarks: Label: Engagement Plan Template Help: The Template for this Engagement Plan Task. Referenced: npsp__Engagement_Plan_Tasks__r (cascade delete)

column.name: npsp__Assigned_To__c
column.remarks: Label: Assigned To Help: This field maps to the Task's Assigned To field. If left blank, the task will be assigned based on the template's Blank Assignment Rule.

column.name: npsp__Comments__c
column.remarks: Label: Comments Help: Comments on the Task.

column.name: npsp__Days_After__c
column.remarks: Label: Days After Help: The number of days after the Engagement Plan creation date, or the parent Task's Due Date, that this Task is due.

column.name: npsp__Parent_Task__c
column.remarks: Label: Parent Task Help: Indicates that this Engagement Plan Task is dependent on a Parent Task. Referenced: npsp__Engagement_Plan_Tasks__r

column.name: npsp__Priority__c
column.remarks: Label: Priority Help: The priority of this Task. Picklist: High | Medium | Low

column.name: npsp__Reminder_Time__c
column.remarks: Label: Reminder Time Help: The time on the Due Date that a reminder appears.

column.name: npsp__Reminder__c
column.remarks: Label: Reminder Help: Sets a reminder for the Task.

column.name: npsp__Send_Email__c
column.remarks: Label: Send Email Help: Determines if an email is sent to the user in the Task's Assigned To field when the Task becomes active. Dependent Tasks are active when their Parent Task is completed.

column.name: npsp__Status__c
column.remarks: Label: Status Help: The Status of a Task. Dependent Tasks are set to "Waiting on Parent Task" until their Parent Task is completed. Picklist: Not Started | In Progress | Completed | Waiting on someone else | Deferred

column.name: npsp__Type__c
column.remarks: Label: Type Help: The type of Task. Picklist: Call | Meeting | Other | Email

table.name: npsp__Engagement_Plan_Template__c
table.remarks: Labels: Engagement Plan Template | Engagement Plan Templates

column.name: npsp__Automatically_Update_Child_Task_Due_Date__c
column.remarks: Label: Automatically Update Child Task Due Date Help: Recalculates a child Task's due date based on when the parent Task was actually completed.

column.name: npsp__Default_Assignee__c
column.remarks: Label: Default Assignee Help: When an Engagement Plan Task's Assigned To field is left blank, who should the Task be assigned to? Picklist: Owner of Object for Engagement Plan | User Creating Engagement Plan

column.name: npsp__Reschedule_To__c
column.remarks: Label: Reschedule To Help: Should Tasks with Due Dates on a weekend day be scheduled for the Friday before the weekend or the Monday after? This applies only if Skip Weekend is selected. Picklist: Monday | Friday

column.name: npsp__Skip_Weekends__c
column.remarks: Label: Skip Weekends Help: If selected, Tasks created in this Engagement Plan will not have Due Dates that fall on Saturday or Sunday.

column.name: npsp__Context_Type__c
column.remarks: Label: Context Type Help: Context that generated the error, if known.

column.name: npsp__Datetime__c
column.remarks: Label: Datetime Default: now() Help: Date & time the error occurred

column.name: npsp__Email_Sent__c
column.remarks: Label: Email Sent Help: Indicates whether an email notification has been sent regarding this error.

column.name: npsp__Error_Type__c
column.remarks: Label: Error Type Help: Type of error that occurred

column.name: npsp__Full_Message__c
column.remarks: Label: Full Message Help: Full text of the error message

column.name: npsp__Object_Type__c
column.remarks: Label: Object Type Help: Type of object on which the error occurred, if known.

column.name: npsp__Posted_in_Chatter__c
column.remarks: Label: Posted in Chatter Help: Indicates whether the error has been posted in Chatter.

column.name: npsp__Record_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Record URL Help: A link to the record which caused the error, if available.

column.name: npsp__Stack_Trace__c
column.remarks: Label: Stack Trace Help: Stack trace for the thrown error, if available at runtime.

column.name: npsp__Async_Error_Check_Last_Run__c
column.remarks: Label: Async Error Check Last Run Help: Used to keep track of the most recent execution of the Async job error logger

column.name: npsp__Disable_Error_Handling__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable Error Handling Help: If checked, NPSP's error handling framework is disabled.

column.name: npsp__Don_t_Auto_Schedule_Default_NPSP_Jobs__c
column.remarks: Label: Don't Auto Schedule Default NPSP Jobs Help: When checked, NPSP won't automatically schedule default recurring jobs. These recurring jobs calculate rollups, update recurring donations and seasonal address, and perform error handling.

column.name: npsp__Enable_Debug__c
column.remarks: Label: Enable Debug Help: Turn this on to enable debug statements in managed package code.

column.name: npsp__Error_Notifications_On__c
column.remarks: Label: Error Notifications Help: Check this if you'd like the system to post notifications for certain type of errors.

column.name: npsp__Error_Notifications_To__c
column.remarks: Label: Error Notification Recipients Help: Select the type of user to send notifications to.

column.name: npsp__Store_Errors_On__c
column.remarks: Label: Store Errors Help: Check this if you'd like errors to be stored in the database.

table.name: npsp__General_Accounting_Unit__c
table.remarks: Labels: General Accounting Unit | General Accounting Units

column.name: npsp__Active__c
column.remarks: Label: Active Help: Active general accounting units are available for selection on allocations. Inactive general accounting units can't have new allocations to them.

column.name: npsp__Average_Allocation__c
column.remarks: Label: Average Allocation Default: 0 Help: The average of all allocations of all time to this general accounting unit.

column.name: npsp__Description__c
column.remarks: Label: Description Help: Extra information about this general accounting unit.

column.name: npsp__First_Allocation_Date__c
column.remarks: Label: First Allocation Date Help: The first Opportunity Close Date of an allocation associated with this general accounting unit.

column.name: npsp__Largest_Allocation__c
column.remarks: Label: Largest Allocation Default: 0 Help: The largest allocation of all time to this general accounting unit.

column.name: npsp__Last_Allocation_Date__c
column.remarks: Label: Last Allocation Date Help: The last Opportunity Close Date of an allocation associated with this general accounting unit.

column.name: npsp__Number_of_Allocations_Last_N_Days__c
column.remarks: Label: Number of Allocations Last N Days Default: 0 Help: Total number of allocations of opportunities in a closed and won stage in the last N days. The value of N can be modified in settings.

column.name: npsp__Number_of_Allocations_Last_Year__c
column.remarks: Label: Number of Allocations Last Year Default: 0 Help: Total number of allocations of opportunities in a closed and won stage last year.

column.name: npsp__Number_of_Allocations_This_Year__c
column.remarks: Label: Number of Allocations This Year Default: 0 Help: Total number of allocations of opportunities in a closed and won stage this year.

column.name: npsp__Number_of_Allocations_Two_Years_Ago__c
column.remarks: Label: Number of Allocations Two Years Ago Default: 0 Help: Total number of allocations of opportunities in a closed and won stage two years ago.

column.name: npsp__Smallest_Allocation__c
column.remarks: Label: Smallest Allocation Default: 0 Help: The smallest allocation of all time to this general accounting unit.

column.name: npsp__Total_Allocations_Last_N_Days__c
column.remarks: Label: Total Allocations Last N Days Default: 0 Help: Sum total of all allocations of opportunities in a closed and won stage in the last N days. The value of N can be modified in settings.

column.name: npsp__Total_Allocations_Last_Year__c
column.remarks: Label: Total Allocations Last Year Default: 0 Help: Sum total of all allocations of opportunities in a closed and won stage last year.

column.name: npsp__Total_Allocations_This_Year__c
column.remarks: Label: Total Allocations This Year Default: 0 Help: Sum total of all allocations of opportunities in a closed and won stage this year.

column.name: npsp__Total_Allocations_Two_Years_Ago__c
column.remarks: Label: Total Allocations Two Years Ago Default: 0 Help: Sum total of all allocations of opportunities in a closed and won stage two years ago.

column.name: npsp__Total_Allocations__c
column.remarks: Label: Total Allocations Default: 0 Help: Sum total of all allocations of opportunities in a closed and won stage.

column.name: npsp__Total_Number_of_Allocations__c
column.remarks: Label: Total Number of Allocations Default: 0 Help: Total number of allocations of opportunities in a closed and won stage.

column.name: npsp__Grant_Deadline_Due_Date__c
column.remarks: Label: Due Date Help: The date on which this particular Deliverable is due.

column.name: npsp__Grant_Deliverable_Close_Date__c
column.remarks: Label: Close Date Help: The date on which the deliverable was actually submitted.

column.name: npsp__Grant_Deliverable_Requirements__c
column.remarks: Label: Requirements Help: Description of what is required for this deliverable.

column.name: npsp__Type__c
column.remarks: Label: Type Picklist: LOI | Application | Interim Report | Final Report

table.name: npsp__Household_Naming_Settings__c
table.remarks: Labels: Household Naming Settings | Household Naming Settings

column.name: npsp__Contact_Overrun_Count__c
column.remarks: Label: Contact Overrun Count Help: Specifies the number of Contacts to explicitly list in a name. After that amount, the Name Overrun will be used.

column.name: npsp__Formal_Greeting_Format__c
column.remarks: Label: Formal Greeting Format Help: The format to use for the Household Formal Greeting.

column.name: npsp__Household_Name_Format__c
column.remarks: Label: Household Name Format Help: The format to use for the Household Name.

column.name: npsp__Implementing_Class__c
column.remarks: Label: Implementing Class Help: The name of a Class that implements the HH_INaming interface to use for Household Naming.

column.name: npsp__Informal_Greeting_Format__c
column.remarks: Label: Informal Greeting Format Help: The format to use for the Household Informal Greeting.

column.name: npsp__Name_Connector__c
column.remarks: Label: Name Connector Help: The string to use to connect pairs in a name. For example, John & Jane, or John and Jane.

column.name: npsp__Name_Overrun__c
column.remarks: Label: Name Overrun Help: The string to use when replacing long lists of names.

column.name: npsp__Active__c
column.remarks: Label: Active Help: Whether this Level is currently in use.

column.name: npsp__Description__c
column.remarks: Label: Description Help: Describes what this Level is for, or what it means to achieve this Level.

column.name: npsp__Engagement_Plan_Template__c
column.remarks: Label: Engagement Plan Template Help: The Engagement Plan Template to apply to the Target Object when this Level is achieved. Referenced: npsp__Levels__r

column.name: npsp__Level_Field__c
column.remarks: Label: Level Field Help: The field (developer name) on the Target object to store the lookup to the current Level. Note that this field implicitly defines the “Ladder” that this Level is part of.

column.name: npsp__Maximum_Amount__c
column.remarks: Label: Maximum Amount (<) Help: The maximum amount the value must be below to be assigned this Level. If empty, then any amount greater than or equal to this Level's Minimum Amount will assign this Level.

column.name: npsp__Minimum_Amount__c
column.remarks: Label: Minimum Amount (>=) Help: The minimum amount to be assigned this Level. If empty, then any amount less than this Level's Maximum Amount will assign this Level.

column.name: npsp__Previous_Level_Field__c
column.remarks: Label: Previous Level Field Help: The field (developer name) on the Target object to store the lookup to the previous Level the object had. Optional.

column.name: npsp__Source_Field__c
column.remarks: Label: Source Field Help: The target object's field (developer name) that defines the amount and timeframe to base this Level on.

column.name: npsp__Target__c
column.remarks: Label: Target Help: The object that this Level applies to. Picklist: Account | Contact

table.name: npsp__Opportunity_Naming_Settings__c
table.remarks: Labels: Opportunity Naming Settings | Opportunity Naming Settings

column.name: npsp__Attribution__c
column.remarks: Label: Attribution Help: Whether this setting applies to individual opportunities, organizational opportunities, or both.

column.name: npsp__Date_Format__c
column.remarks: Label: Date Format Help: The format for dates included in this opportunity name.

column.name: npsp__Opportunity_Name_Format__c
column.remarks: Label: Opportunity Name Format Help: The format to use for Opportunity naming.

column.name: npsp__Opportunity_Record_Types__c
column.remarks: Label: Opportunity Record Types Help: Specifies the opportunity record type that this naming scheme is for.

table.name: npsp__Partial_Soft_Credit__c
table.remarks: Labels: Partial Soft Credit | Partial Soft Credits

column.name: npsp__Contact__c
column.remarks: Label: Contact Help: The contact who gets this soft credit.

column.name: npsp__Opportunity__c
column.remarks: Label: Opportunity Help: The Opportunity this soft credit applies to.

column.name: npsp__Amount__c
column.remarks: Label: Amount Help: The amount to be soft credited.

column.name: npsp__Contact_Name__c
column.remarks: Label: Contact Name Formula: HYPERLINK('/' + npsp__Contact__c,npsp__Contact__r.FirstName + ' ' + npsp__Contact__r.LastName, '_self') Help: The contact's full name.

column.name: npsp__Contact_Role_ID__c
column.remarks: Label: Contact Role ID Help: The OpportunityContactRole this soft credit applies to.

column.name: npsp__Role_Name__c
column.remarks: Label: Role Name Help: The Role of this soft credit.

table.name: npsp__Relationship_Sync_Excluded_Fields__c
table.remarks: Labels: Fields to Exclude from Sync | Relationship Sync Excluded Fields

column.name: npsp__Active__c
column.remarks: Label: Active Help: Determines if the job will be active or not.

column.name: npsp__Class_Name__c
column.remarks: Label: Class Name Help: Class that will be scheduled to run at a certain frequency.

column.name: npsp__Frequency__c
column.remarks: Label: Frequency Help: How ofter to run the job. Picklist: Hourly | Daily | Weekly | Monthly | Quarterly

column.name: npsp__Last_Time_Run__c
column.remarks: Label: Last Time Run Help: Last time the job was run.

column.name: npsp__Active__c
column.remarks: Label: Active Help: Indicates that this module is active

column.name: npsp__Asynchronous__c
column.remarks: Label: Asynchronous After Events Help: Indicates that this module should be run asynchronously in this transaction, for any of its After events.

column.name: npsp__Class__c
column.remarks: Label: Class Help: Name of the class to be run

column.name: npsp__Load_Order__c
column.remarks: Label: Load Order Help: Order in which this module should be run, helps maintain dependencies in the modules and data.

column.name: npsp__Object__c
column.remarks: Label: Object Help: Name of the object this handler should be run for

column.name: npsp__Trigger_Action__c
column.remarks: Label: Trigger Action Help: Trigger Action in which this module should fire Picklist: BeforeInsert | BeforeUpdate | BeforeDelete | AfterInsert | AfterUpdate | AfterDelete | AfterUndelete

column.name: npsp__User_Managed__c
column.remarks: Label: User Managed Help: Check it if you intent to manage the record yourself. Be aware that updates to the package won't update the record.

column.name: npsp__Usernames_to_Exclude__c
column.remarks: Label: Usernames to Exclude Help: Semicolon separated list of Salesforce usernames that this trigger will NOT run for. Leave blank to run for all users.
